analysis.key_quote: I oppose the implementation of Schedule F, as this administration has proven that its political appointees (like Doge) make changes without deep knowledge of the matters at hand and without regard for the wellbeing of this nation and its people.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F and expresses concerns about the politicization of civil service, emphasizing the importance of dedicated civil servants and their expertise over political loyalty.
